# UCircularProgress Circular Progress Bar

## Example
### Basic Usage

``` html
<u-circular-progress :percent="36"></u-circular-progress>
```

## API
### Props/Attrs

| Prop/Attr | Type | Options | Default | Description |
| --------- | ---- | ------- | ------- | ----------- |
| percent | number | | `0` | percent |

### Slots

#### (default)

Insert text or HTML.
